TYPE_AND_ACTIVITIES.TYPE_OF_CONTRACTING_AUTHORITY_OTHER: Units of local government and of the city of Skopje- General public service

TITLE_CONTRACT.P: Basic project for construction of a secondary distribution gas network in the Municipality of Shtip with a maximum length of 20 000 meters with overview

LOCATION.P: On the territory described in the project a description which is presented in the tender documentation attached to this announcement.

SHORT_CONTRACT_DESCRIPTION.P: More detailed description of the subject for the agreement for public procurement is given in the tender documentation attached to this announcement.

ECONOMIC_OPERATORS_PERSONAL_SITUATION.P: — statement of the economic operator stating that no effective verdict has been pronounced in the past 5 years for participation in criminal organization, corruption, fraud or money laundering,
— confirmation that no bankruptcy procedure has been initiated by a competent authority,
— confirmation that no liquidation procedure has been initiated by a competent authority,
— confirmation for paid taxes, contributions and other public fees from the authority competent in the country where the economic operator has been registered,

— confirmation from the Registry for penalties for committed criminal acts of the legal entities stating that no secondary penalty, ban on participation in open call procedures, on awarding of contracts for public procurement and contracts on public-private partnership has been pronounced,

— confirmation from the Registry for penalties for committed criminal acts of the legal entities stating that no secondary penalty, temporary penalty or permanent ban on the performance of particular activity has been pronounced,

— confirmation stating that no misdemeanour sanction – ban on the performance of the profession, activity or obligation, i.e. temporary ban on the performance of a particular activity has been pronounced with the effective verdict.

EAF_CAPACITY_INFORMATION.P: — a report of balance sheet certified by competent authority i.e. revised balance sheet or extracts from the report of the balance sheet in case when its issuing is regulated with a law in the country in which the economic operator is registered or — a statement of the complete turnover of a company (a datum of income statement issued by a competent authority, i.e. revised balance of success) and in a place where it is appropriate, from the turnover in the field covered by the Public procurement contact, at least for the last 3 financial years mostly for which this information is available, in accordance with the date of a company establishment or it started functioning and in accordance with availability of such materials

EAF_CAPACITY_MIN_LEVEL.P: — minimum realized income of MKD 9 000 000 in the last 3 years.

T_CAPACITY_INFORMATION.P: — A list of main services referring to the subject's service prepared and signed by the economic operator. The list of main services should consist of values, dates, customers (contracting authorities or economic operators). In addition to the list, appropriate contracts should be submitted in a scanned form.
— Copies of sample M1/M2 or Contracts for business technical cooperation, authority B for designing of minimum 3 (three) mechanical engineers with appropriate B category authorization for designing.

T_CAPACITY_MIN_LEVEL.P: — The economic operator is required to have a previous experience in designing ideas or Basic projects of gas networks with a total projected area of minimum 20.000 meters.
— The economic operator of technical staff is required to have at least 3(three) mechanical engineers with an appropriate B authority of designing.

EXECUTION_SERVICE_RESERVED_PARTICULAR_PR.P: — minimum License B for designing constructions/building of the second category according to The law of Construction building ("Off Gazette of R. Macedonia", nº 70/2013- Cleared text and nº 79/2013, 137/2013, 162/ 2013, 27/2014,28/2014,42/2014,115/2014,149/2014,187/2014,44/2015,129/2015,217/2015,30/2016,31/2019 39/2016,71/2016 and 132/2016), issued by The Ministry of transport and communications of R. Macedonia).

USE_ELECTRONIC_AUCTION.P: The contracted authority will use electronic auction as a last stage in the open procedure. The subject of the electronic auction is the total price including all the expenses, sale and the import customs, without VAT. The starting price is the lowest one from the acceptable offers, submitted in the primary base of the procedure.

The invitation for participation at the auction will be electronically delivered through ESPP (electronic system for public procurement) after full evaluation of the initial offer, to all economic operators who have submitted acceptable bids in the first stage of the procedure and are registered in the ESPP(electronic system for public procurement). The invitation for participation at the auction will be electronically sent to the user’s profile mailbox of ESPP i.e. to the mentioned person in the Bid form who was previously registered in the ESPP.
